text: Georgios Petropoulos (, 23 May 1872 - 1937) was a Greek fencer and shooter. He competed at the 1906 and 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1872 births Category:1937 deaths Category:Greek male fencers Category:Greek male sport shooters Category:Olympic fencers of Greece Category:Olympic shooters of Greece Category:Fencers at the 1906 Intercalated Games Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1906 Intercalated Games Category:Shooters at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:People from Western Greece
title: Georgios Petropoulos
